text: The women's heptathlon event at the 2018 Asian Games was held at the Gelora Bung Karno Stadium, Jakarta, Indonesia on 28–29 August. The event was won by Swapna Barman from India.https://www.indiatoday.in/sports/asian- games-2018/story/asian-games-2018-india-s-swapna-barman-wins-gold-in- heptathlon-1326749-2018-08-29https://uk.reuters.com/article/uk-games-asia- athletics/the-alchemist-behind-indias-heptathlon-gold-idUKKCN1LH36T ==Schedule== All times are Western Indonesia Time
